summary: Provides custom logging handlers for Prefect, including a handler that forwards log records to a background worker which batches and sends them to the Prefect API, and a handler that streams logs to an interactive console using Rich, handling configuration, batching, and asynchronous execution.
business_intent: Facilitate reliable collection and delivery of workflow logs to Prefect’s backend services while also offering real‑time console visibility, thereby enhancing observability, debugging, and operational insight for Prefect orchestrations.
